<JD_START>
Job Title: Accounting Assistant

Location: Wichita, KS

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Good Times Restaurants, Inc. owns, operates, franchises, and/or licenses Good Times Burgers and Frozen Custard and Bad Daddy’s Burger Bar. Good Times Burgers currently has 31 operating locations homegrown in Colorado. Bad Daddy’s currently has 40 locations throughout Colorado, Oklahoma, and all over the Southeast.
Our company is made up of a group of folks who balance getting their work done with some good laughs and comradery in between and we are looking to grow our support center to add an Accounting Assistant to the team!
So what does the Accounting Assistant role look like?The Accounting Assistant will perform complex clerical, bookkeeping, accounting assignments, routine clerical, filing, and data entry tasks for accounting data including accounts payable, billing, and receivables.  Duties/Responsibilities:Conducts routine data entry management for accounting records including accounts payable and billing.Reviews billing statements, invoices, and similar documents for accuracy; alerts supervisory staff of any discrepancies.Distributes accounting reports as directed.Create and post journal entries.Understanding of debits and credits.Manage credit card expense reporting tool, including setting up new users and managing submission of reports.Performs other related duties and ad hoc reports as assigned.
Required Skills/Abilities:Thorough understanding of bookkeeping practices and procedures, with the ability to train others in related practices and procedures.Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Ability to follow verbal and written instructions.Ability to type at least 40 words per minute.Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite or similar software, with a strong background in Excel.Knowledge of spreadsheets and accounting software.
Education and Experience:High School diploma or equivalent required.Bookkeeping training is preferred.Three to five years of related experience is required.
Physical Requirements:Prolonged periods sitting at a desk and working on a computer.Must be able to lift up to 15 pounds at times.
What's in it for you? Awesome question! Here are some of the benefits you will have as an Accounting AssistantTarget incentive bonus.Currently a remote position with the potential for hybrid 2-3 days a week at a satellite office in Wichita, KS within the next year.Paid vacation, sick days, parental, and bereavement leave.Paid time off for eight holidays throughout the year.Comprehensive health benefits including dental and vision.Company matching 401k.Casual work atmosphere.
If you are looking to kickstart your career in accounting and possess the required skills, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.
Good Times Restaurants Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
